'''''Vinyar Tengwar 45''''' is the forty-fifth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|44|46}}

==Contents==
* "Addenda and Corrigenda to the ''[[Etymologies]]'', Part one"✫ — eds. Carl F. Hostetter and Patrick H. Wynne

<small>✫ contains formerly unpublished material</small>
